org.jhove2.module.identify.file
Class LibmagicJnaWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.module.identify.file.LibmagicJnaWrapper

public class LibmagicJnaWrapper
extends Object

A wrapper for the libmagic library that relies on JNA.

Author:
hbian

Constructor Detail

LibmagicJnaWrapper

public LibmagicJnaWrapper()
                   throws JHOVE2Exception
Creates a new instance returning the default information: MIME type and character encoding.

Throws:
JHOVE2Exception - if any error occurred while initializing the libmagic.
See Also:
LibmagicJnaWrapper(int), MAGIC_MIME

Method Detail

close

public void close()
Closes the magic database and deallocates any resources used.

getError

public String getError()
Returns a textual explanation of the last error.

Returns:
the textual description of the last error, or null if there was no error.

getMimeType

public String getMimeType(String filePath)
Returns the textual description of the contents of the specified file.

Parameters:
filePath - the path of the file to be identified.
Returns:
the textual description of the file, or null if an error occurred.

getMimeType

public String getMimeType(Buffer buffer,
                          long length)
Returns textual description of the contents of the buffer argument.

Parameters:
buffer - the data to analyze.
length - the length, in bytes, of the buffer.
Returns:
the textual description of the buffer data, or null if an error occurred.

compile

public int compile(String magicFiles)
Compiles the colon-separated list of database text files passed in as magicFiles.

Parameters:
magicFiles - the magic database file(s), or null to use the default database.
Returns:
0 on success and -1 on failure.

load

public int load(String magicFiles)
Loads the colon-separated list of database files passed in as magicFiles. This method must be used before any magic queries be performed.

Parameters:
magicFiles - the magic database file(s), or null to use the default database.
Returns:
0 on success and -1 on failure.
